content:
Google is using location data gathered from smartphones to create mobility reports and help public health officials understand how peopleâ€™s movements have changed in response to the global COVID-19 pandemic.
The reports cover 131 countries, to start. In many locations, users can search for more regional data, examining reports for individual states, provinces, and counties.
https://www.google.com/covid19/mobility/

COVID-19 Community Mobility Report
See how your community is moving around differently due to COVID-19
